attributes.action: Not allow MPs to be exempt from Freedom of Information act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No one can be above the law, to exempt MPs from an act that they themselves passed is hypocritical in the extreme. They are PUBLIC servants paid for by the taxpayer and their expense accounts etc must be open to public scrutiny

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
